SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
/* Actualiza Tabla H de Capitas de Salud */
declare @PERIODO INT set @PERIODO = ?
DELETE FROM DW_SALUD.dbo.H_PERSONAS_CAPITAS_SALUD where id_periodo = @PERIODO
INSERT INTO DW_SALUD.dbo.H_PERSONAS_CAPITAS_SALUD (id_periodo, id_capita, id_persona, afiliado, subnumero, secuencia, id_producto, id_subproducto, id_plan_producto, cant_personas_capita, id_localidad_capita) select id_periodo, id_capita, id_persona, afiliado, subnumero, secuencia, id_producto, id_subproducto, id_plan_producto, 1 as cant_personas_capita, IsNull(id_localidad_capita,9999999) as id_localidad_capita from Consultas_DW.dbo.AUX_H_PERSONAS_CAPITAS_SALUD where id_periodo = @PERIODO

property.description: The number of seconds before a command times out. A value of 0 indicates an infinite time-out.
property.name: CommandTimeout

property.description: Specifies the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowset

property.description: Specifies the variable that contains the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowsetVariable

property.description: The SQL command to be executed.
property.name: SqlCommand

property.description: Specifies the column code page to use when code page information is unavailable from the data source.
property.name: DefaultCodePage

property.description: Forces the use of the DefaultCodePage property value when describing character data.
property.name: AlwaysUseDefaultCodePage

property.description: Specifies the mode used to access the database.
property.name: AccessMode

property.description: Indicates whether the values supplied for identity columns will be copied to the destination. If false, values for identity columns will be auto-generated at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepIdentity

property.description: Indicates whether the columns containing null will have null inserted in the destination. If false, columns containing null will have their default values inserted at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepNulls

property.description: Specifies options to be used with fast load. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadOptions

property.description: Specifies when commits are issued during data insertion. A value of 0 specifies that one commit will be issued at the end of data insertion. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadMaxInsertCommitSize

connection.description: The OLE DB runtime connection used to access the database.
connection.name: OleDbConnection

component.contactInfo: OLE DB Source;Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server; (C) Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved; http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support;7
component.name: OLE DB Source

property.description: The number of seconds before a command times out. A value of 0 indicates an infinite time-out.
property.name: CommandTimeout

property.description: Specifies the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowset

property.description: Specifies the variable that contains the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowsetVariable

property.description: The SQL command to be executed.
property.name: SqlCommand

properties.property: SELECT DISTINCT D.GENERADORES_ID as Id_Capita, D.PERIODO as Id_Periodo, NUMERO_PERSONA as Id_Persona, CUENTA as Afiliado, SUBCUENTA as Subnumero, D.SECUENCIA as Secuencia, CODIGO_PROD as Id_Producto, CODIGO_PLAN as Id_plan_Producto, CODIGO_SPR as id_subproducto, IMPORTE, CODIGO_POSTAL as ID_LOCALIDAD_CAPITA FROM PADRONES.PADRONES_DETALLE D inner join PADRONES.GENERADORES G on g.ID = d.GENERADORES_ID inner join PADRONES.GENERADORES_TIPOS T on t.ID = g.GENERADORES_TIPOS_ID inner join PADRONES.PADRONES_CABECERA C on C.GENERADORES_ID = d.GENERADORES_ID inner join PADRONES.PADRONES_ESTADOS E on E.ID = C.padrones_estados_id where T.ID = 1 and D.Periodo = ? and ((E.ID = 2 and d.generadores_id = 124) or (E.ID = 6))

property.description: The variable that contains the SQL command to be executed.
property.name: SqlCommandVariable

property.description: Specifies the column code page to use when code page information is unavailable from the data source.
property.name: DefaultCodePage

property.description: Forces the use of the DefaultCodePage property value when describing character data.
property.name: AlwaysUseDefaultCodePage

property.description: Specifies the mode used to access the database.
property.name: AccessMode

property.description: The mappings between the parameters in the SQL command and variables.
property.name: ParameterMapping

connection.description: The OLE DB runtime connection used to access the database.
connection.name: OleDbConnection

DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2; © 2007 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1
Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2; © 2007 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
Declare @Periodo int Set @Periodo = (select MAX(id_periodo) from H_PERSONAS_CAPITAS_SALUD)
---- Inserta el periodo que se ejecuta en el Padron de Capitas if ( select max(id_periodo) from Consultas_DW.dbo.D_DATA_CAPITAS_INFORMADAS ) <> @Periodo begin Insert into Consultas_DW.dbo.D_DATA_CAPITAS_INFORMADAS select @Periodo, 0 as informado
end
---- Comprueba si se informo ese periodo, si el mismo no se informo se envia un mail y se actualiza este periodo con un 1 para avisar que se informo este periodo. if (select informado from Consultas_DW.dbo.D_DATA_CAPITAS_INFORMADAS where id_periodo = @Periodo ) = 0 begin EXEC msdb.dbo.sp_send_dbmail @profile_name = 'Soporte MicroStrategy', @recipients = 'juanfrancisco.trinchieri@sancorsalud.com.ar', @subject = 'Padron Capitas - Finalizo el Batch Correctamente', @body = 'Se informa en este correo que finalizo el siguiente periodo correspondiente a Padron Capitas.
Además se notifica para el periodo vigente de capitas que pueden existir capitas que no poseen información en
H_PERSONAS_CAPITAS_SALUD:
', @file_attachments = '', @query = 'declare @PERIODO int set @PERIODO = (select MAX(id_periodo) from H_PERSONAS_CAPITAS_SALUD)
select @PERIODO as id_periodo_vigente
select ''Con la Siguiente Tabla Podemos Controlar las Capitas que deben estar para este periodo en la H_Personas_Capitas_Salud'' as Comentario
select s.id_capita, s.de_capita as de_capita_no_esta_presente_en_H_PERSONAS_CAPITAS_SALUD from D_CAPITAS_SALUD s , D_FECHA f WHERE f.id_periodo = @PERIODO /* Es igual al ultimo Periodo de Afiliados. */ and (SUBSTRING(S.fecha_vigencia_desde,1,6) < = @PERIODO) and (SUBSTRING(S.fecha_vigencia_hasta,1,6) > = @PERIODO or S.fecha_vigencia_hasta = 0) and id_capita_salud = 1 and s.id_capita not in (select distinct id_capita from H_PERSONAS_CAPITAS_SALUD where id_periodo = @PERIODO) group by s.id_capita, s.de_capita order by s.id_capita
select ''La Siguiente Tabla Muestra Todas las Capitas Vigentes de Este Periodo'' as Comentario
select distinct h.id_capita , d.de_capita from H_PERSONAS_CAPITAS_SALUD H inner join D_CAPITAS_SALUD D on h.id_capita = d.id_capita where id_periodo = @PERIODO
', @query_result_separator = '|', @execute_query_database = 'DW_SALUD';
update Consultas_DW.dbo.D_DATA_CAPITAS_INFORMADAS set informado = 1 from Consultas_DW.dbo.D_DATA_CAPITAS_INFORMADAS where id_periodo = @Periodo
end
